ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: I did put practice points into piercing, but I can t get it to go above 5. I don t know what, if anything, I m doing wrong. ... From: John Spyke Alexander
ygData.messageBody:
I did put practice points into piercing, but I can't get it to go above 5.
I don't know what,
if anything, I'm doing wrong.


-----Original Message-----
From: John "Spyke" Alexander <spykealpha@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 4:11 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] neglected melee skills..


>From: "John \"Spyke\" Alexander" <spykealpha@...>
>
>> From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>>
>> I forgot to work on my piercing skills for about 4 levels... then when I
>went back to using a Giant snake fang.. it wont increase my skill.. Do
I
>have to put some practice points into it? Or does it just take longer to
>get back to increasing?
>>
>> Drev, level 16 wizard on Tarew Marr
>
>With the way the skill system works... It should be easier for you to
>increase your skill now as the skill cap has increased from what it was
four
>levels ago.
>
>Now, as skills get higher, it takes longer for them to increase (within
>reason.. sometimes you'll see nothing, then it'll jump up 3 points in 3
>swings). I would just continue to use piercing normally. It will go up.
>
>-Spyke Pha'al
>
